Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

cn.sellerName: Xiamen Kuaibaoyou Network Technology Co., Ltd
cn.description:
《打造世界》结合了策略、方块建造沙盒以及塔防多种元素。游戏中，你不是一个人在战斗，需要带领矮人部落在这个充满危险生物的随机世界里进行探索，安排他们分工合作收集资源，制作需要的物品、武器和盔甲，以及建造城堡，来抵御危险生物的入侵。

【世界探索、沙盒生存】
游戏共有七个不同的世界（游戏本体4个地图+3个dlc地图），每个世界都是随机生成的岛屿，你可以在游戏中自由的改变地形地貌。不同世界有着各自的地理及生物特色，同时也暗藏各类怪物和BOSS。带上大聪明矮人征服各个世界吧！

【资源采集、制作发展】
游戏中挖掘矿藏、捕捉动物、打败敌人、种植农田等等方式获得原料；升级科技树，制作数百种完全不同的物品！要知道除了常规的武器、建筑材料、食物、炼金药水外，你甚至建造一个广大的矿井网，配上升降机和铁路，快速抵达藏有最珍贵金属的矿脉中。如何发展矮人部落，你可要好好思考一下。
对了，必须得告诉你，游戏中存在各种魔法，比如打开传送门，提高矮人运输资源的效率；使用魔法之光照亮黑暗的洞穴吓跑怪物；使用降水或是魔法森林加快树木成长，或者是使用指南针魔法找到隐藏资源，从而帮助加快资源开采，探索世界。

【自由建造、殖民管理】
发展一个部落可没那么容易，你需要安排矮人们的衣食住行，可以直接控制矮人进行挖掘、砍伐、攻击、建造等操作，并在矮人与怪物和BOSS战斗时使用魔法帮助他们。
在游戏刚开始时，你只有1位矮人，随着在这个世界的等级提升，会获得更多的矮人；而随着人数越来越多，部落规模也越来越大的。
部落的发展，建筑是必不可少的，发挥你天马星空的想象吧，无论是建古代宫殿风格、还是想要征服天空的空中住宅、又或者是结合现代科技坚不可摧的堡垒，只要你脑洞够大，创造独属于你的矮人之家！

【即时战略&塔防战斗】
有些怪物会成群结队的来掠夺矮人资源，有些怪物会定期从传送门而来攻打矮人，你需要带领矮人建立攻防系统，在的堡垒周围的路上设满陷阱和导弹塔，抵抗成群结队入侵而来的敌人。

【DLC拓展内容】
丰富的DLC内容拓展既可以带你领略不一样的世界：融合中式风格元素的《龙之神庙》、家园领地保卫战的《孤山世界》、暗黑领主和矮人的终极决战《邪恶之心》，还可以让你在世界探索中增加更多乐趣：女矮人携宠物及新装备登场的《姐妹连》、在神秘的斯芬克斯的沙漠世界探索神庙的《废弃矿山》、充满了植物和古老的魔法的《贪婪洞窟》，召唤英雄战士和法师的《英雄对决》，对抗更加强大的地下深渊头目的《怪物联盟》。

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

cn.description:
请订阅PlanItPhoto微信公众号，查看更多的精彩文章和教程。我们的另外有个免费应用巧摄现场版也已经发布。

免费中文视频教学：
YouTube：
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
哔哩哔哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499


另外我们还有20个小时的收费直播课。欢迎订阅我们的微信公众号了解更多信息。

也许您正在寻找一个这样的应用，可以帮助您计划风光摄影的各种细节。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧摄专业版就是梦寐以求的应用。不管您喜欢风光摄影的哪个方面，旅行，城市，自然，夜景，星空，银河，星轨，延时，这个应用都可以帮助到您。

著名美国摄影师安塞尔•亚当斯在他的第一本书《Taos Pueblo》强调了“可视化”的概念。他提出“预可视化”，也就是说摄影师应该在按下快门之前就想像出最后出来的照片会使怎样。当然，很多伟大的照片是即兴拍摄出来的，但是对于风光摄影师来说，如果可以提前预见到场景的样子会很大程度上避免因为没有准备好而错失良机，也会大大增加出好片的机会。

现在科技发达，摄影师可以使用很多不同的工具实现场景的预可视化。当然，手机应用就是很多这样的工具之一，而且越来越流行。我们这个巧摄专业版就是这样的一个全功能的应用。它巧妙地利用地图结合各种摄影工具和日月银河星历功能，来实现场景预可视化。

在这个看似简单的应用里面，我们加了很多的功能。比如说任何地点的GPS坐标、海拔高度、两点距离、海拔高度差、以及从某一点是否可以看到某个景点。这些信息不单对摄影师，可能对很多热爱旅游的人来说，都是重要的。而对摄影师，我们还专门提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不仅如此，我们还加入了星历表的功能。这样您就可以查到任何一天任何地点的日出日落时间、月出月落时间、曙暮光开始结束时间、黄金时段、蓝色时段。甚至任何时刻的太阳和月亮的位置你都可以查到。还有星星、星座、银河、星云的位置。另外还有星轨计算器和延时摄影计算器功能，曝光自动计算，ND滤镜计算器，光度计，彩虹位置预测，部分国家的潮汐数据。可以说是风光摄影需要的功能，应有尽有。和其它类似应用不同的是我们这个应用把上面提到的所有功能都在地图上或者取景框方式下直观地显示出来，各个功能之间还可以结合使用。

风光摄影是我们对自然界的探险。 我们知道您在外面探索时，可能会没有任何网络。 巧摄专业版当然知道这个，所以只要您预装离线海拔文件和离线mbtiles地图，您可以完全离线使用该应用程序，而无需网络连接。

许可协议：https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
隐私声明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

cn.description:
【游戏特色】
坐落于神秘远星的枪牢森严诡谲，无数枪怪弹魔徘徊在地下深处——传说中可以抹去过去的神枪亦藏匿于此。射击，劫掠，翻滚躲闪，背负痛苦回忆的探险者孤注一掷，突进层层膛室，在枪林弹雨中寻找能够翻转命运的终极宝藏……
▶ 原汁原味的枪弹地狱
狱室迷宫随机错布，每一层都充斥着穷凶极恶的枪支炮灰，终极恶魔各自布下奇诡的枪火弹网。选择不同背景的英雄角色，穿越重重膛室和机关陷阱探索神枪残迹。
▶ 天马行空的神枪宝藏
变蛇激光、豌豆射手、彩虹、蜜蜂——没错，蜜蜂！每把枪里射出的都是未知，亦能和掉落道具组合出1+1>2。探险者的背包不设上限，各类彩蛋奇宝都在地牢深处等待发掘。
▶ 枪打子弹？子弹打枪？
所有人都是枪的忠实信徒，一切都和枪弹有关！弹壳货币、子弹小怪、扳机兄弟……在地牢里，你甚至可以扮演一个用子弹枪发射枪子弹的子弹人！

【针对手游的设计优化】
▶ 打不过？就「滚弹」！
面对密集的子弹壁垒，使用“无敌”翻滚灵活闪避！切换多种翻滚模式，选择自动、手动或半辅助瞄准射击，自定义调整按键布局，我们希望为玩家提供最适配手游的操作应对地牢难关！
▶ 双人协作，联机闯关
我们专门为移动端开发了线上联机双人模式。在联机大厅创建/加入房间，或是通过好友系统邀请伙伴，自由选择角色并肩作战！
---------------------------
在游戏过程中需要帮助，或遇到问题，都可以加入官方群联系管理员，管理员会与大家一对一沟通，帮忙解决
【XD×挺进地牢】官方9群：778206081

cn.description:
一款近乎真实、专业的战争模拟游戏！置身战略军事沙盒中，畅享接近现实的物理引擎。Landfall官方授权，Steam超12万条玩家评测，97%好评率，在游戏中排兵布阵，战术演练，带给你身临其境的战争体验。

游戏基于PC原版移植，买断制发售，并针对手机玩家的操作和观看体验做出专门优化。

【史诗级的战役演出】
在战役模式中，巧妙利用地图地形和兵种阵容，制定花式布兵打法投入战场。由于“超现实”的物理引擎效果，战斗中将会迸发许多意料之外的状况；拉进镜头，切换子弹时间，好戏才刚刚上演！

【100+天马行空的兵种】
游戏提供百余种性能（性格）各不相同的兵种，来自各个派系、时代文明和神话传说。从发射尖刺的仙人掌到召唤分身耍棍的孙悟空，这些“训练有素”的战士能够对战局起到蝴蝶效应般的影响。

【自定义沙盒，兵种DIY】
不满足于挑战既定的战役？玩转沙盒模式，自由切换地图，自定义战局和对战阵容，随意拿捏自己想要的兵种属性、服装，和武器技能，打造独一无二的奇迹憨憨军团演绎精彩战斗。

【支持联机】
手机版加入联机对战模式和房间大厅；随机匹配，又或是邀请好友尽情切磋！

hk.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

hk.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。

hk.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

hk.description:
中隊已經到達你的移動設備！躲避子彈風暴，面對可怕的空中戰爭機器！帶領你的中隊在兩個不同的戰役中取得勝利，充滿故事曲折和傳奇首領大戰！

德國空軍王牌 - 中隊是一款驚心動魄的垂直捲動射擊遊戲，具有引人入勝的全語音敘述。躲避子彈，收集大量增強器，明智地使用特殊技能擊敗敵人。總計50個關卡的兩大戰役，一波又一波的各種致命敵人，眾多史詩首領大戰。你能完成任務嗎？

當歐洲看起來還是自由的時候，一個被稱為“德國空軍王牌”的秘密德國突擊隊借此機會反擊並入侵美國！你的責任就是，在誇張的空戰中，駕駛致命的鋼鐵之翼，重建和平與自由！但是，每個故事都有兩個方面。隨著德國空軍王牌開始對美國進攻，你負責帶領一群精銳德國飛行員執行秘密任務。從百慕大三角的一個秘密基地，開始詭計多端的史詩級空中冒險。選擇你的陣營，決定你的角色，然後起飛！

- 英勇的非玩家角色僚機將遵從你的命令

- 50個關卡和刺激的任務 
- 12個壯觀的首領大戰
- 史詩般的電影式管弦樂配樂

魚雷、炸彈，強大武器上陣作戰！
坦克、步兵，攻克敵人陣地！
轟炸機群，搗毀敵軍指揮部！
潛艇偷襲，令敵軍防不勝防！
在惡劣地形中佈置你的炮兵部隊！
清除灘頭、湖泊、海峽的各種障礙！
伏擊敵人！ 
為部隊提供物資和彈藥！
護衛航母及戰艦群！

特色：
- 去除廣告！
- 以二戰為背景的回合制戰略行動遊戲
- 激動人心的戰役和充滿挑戰的任務

感謝您選擇 '1942 Pacific Front'！

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

hk.releaseNotes:

修復了鎖定時間會隱藏時鐘圖標的問題。

hk.description:
請訂閱PlanItPhoto微信公衆號，檢視更多的精彩文章和教程。我們的另外有個免費應用巧攝現場版也已經發布。

44集免費中文視頻教學：
YouTube:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
嗶哩嗶哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499

另外我們還有20個小時的收費直播課。歡迎訂閱我們的微信公衆號瞭解更多資訊。

也許您正在尋找一個這樣的應用，可以說明您計劃風光攝影的各種細節。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧攝專業版就是夢寐以求的應用。不管您喜歡風光攝影的哪個方面，旅遊，城市，自然，夜景，星空，銀河，星軌，縮時，這個應用都可以說明到您。

著名美國攝影師安塞爾•亞當斯在他的第一本書《Taos Pueblo》強調了“可視化”的概念。他提出“預可視化”，也就是說攝影師應該在按下快門之前就想像出最後出來的照片會使怎樣。當然，很多偉大的照片是即興拍攝出來的，但是對於風光攝影師來說，如果可以提前預見到場景的樣子會很大程度上避免因爲沒有準備好而錯失良機，也會大大增加出好片的機會。

現在科技發達，攝影師可以使用很多不同的工具實現場景的預可視化。當然，手機應用就是很多這樣的工具之一，而且越來越流行。我們這個巧攝專業版就是這樣的一個全功能的應用。它巧妙地利用地圖結合各種攝影工具和日月銀河星曆功能，來實現場景預可視化。

在這個看似簡單的應用裏面，我們加了很多的功能。比如說任何地點的GPS座標、海拔高度、兩點距離、海拔高度差、以及從某一點是否可以看到某個景點。這些資訊不單對攝影師，可能對很多熱愛旅遊的人來說，都是重要的。而對攝影師，我們還專門提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不僅如此，我們還加入了星曆錶的功能。這樣您就可以查到任何一天任何地點的日出日落時間、月出月落時間、曙暮光開始結束時間、黃金時段、藍色時段。甚至任何時刻的太陽和月亮的位置你都可以查到。還有星星、星座、銀河、星雲的位置。另外還有星軌計算器和縮時攝影計算器功能，曝光自動計算，ND濾鏡計算器，光度計，彩虹位置預測，部分國家的潮汐資料。可以說是風光攝影需要的功能，應有盡有。和其它類似應用不同的是我們這個應用把上面提到的所有功能都在地圖上或者取景框方式下直觀地顯示出來，各個功能之間還可以結合使用。

風光攝影是我們對自然界的探險。 我們知道您在外面探索時，可能會沒有任何網路。 巧攝專業版當然知道這個，所以只要您預裝離線海拔檔案和離線mbtiles地圖，您可以完全離線使用該應用程式，而無需網路連接。

隱私聲明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

hk.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

在台湾和日本鐵路線上駕駛電車並載客。

・簡單的益智遊戲
“東京電車２”是一款規則簡單的益智遊戲。無需專業知識。
火車迷，遊戲迷，人人都能享受。

・致所有將成為行動調度員的人
在日本的早晨，顧客們正在等待火車的到來去上班。
讓我們啟動火車並運送客戶。

- 遊戲目標
日本鐵路公司是營利性組織。讓我們以高營業利潤為目標吧！

・如何產生利潤
票價收入-出發成本=營業利潤。

票價收入是在車站的顧客登上火車時產生的。
示例）如果兩名乘客在票價為 20 的車站上車，他們將獲得 40。

發車費按發車時的車廂數收取。
示例）2 節車廂的火車為 30，4 節車廂的火車為 40，10 節車廂的火車為 70。


一個人可以乘坐一輛車。
票價收入是在乘客登上火車時產生的。
調整行駛距離和車輛數量以獲得最大利潤。
離境費用。如果你開的火車太多，而佔用率下降，你就會損失收入。

·操作方法
控制非常簡單，規則也很簡單。
你所要做的就是調整列車的車廂數量，讓列車在最佳時間出發。
隨著遊戲的進行，將會出現各種變化，例如特快列車和換乘站。

·體積
享受 50 多條路線。
請體驗日本鐵路公司的各種運輸策略。

- 沒有廣告，沒有計費
沒有應用內購買。無廣告。
請專心玩遊戲。孩子們可以安心地玩耍。
讓我們分享在 社交媒體 上駕駛的結果。

・鐵路玩
JR東日本、JR東海、JR西日本、JR九州、東武、東急、西武、京王、京急、京阪、阪急、阪神、近鐵、名鐵、小田急、南海、西鐵、相鐵、京成、東京地鐵、大阪地鐵、都營地鐵, 筑波快遞

・容量約130MB
存儲負擔也小。根本沒有繁重的處理。

hk.description:
Feeling overwhelmed by the chaos of life? Find your peace and vitality with BreatheIn, the app that helps you unlock the power of mindful breathing.

Rediscover Calm and Energy

Deep, mindful breathing is the key to a calm mind and a vibrant body. With BreatheIn, immerse yourself in guided exercises that harmonize your body and mind, leading to true balance and renewal.

Expertly Curated Practices

We've handpicked and tested each exercise to ensure you get the best. Start your journey toward a healthier, more fulfilled life today!

Seamless Apple Health Integration

Track your progress effortlessly—BreatheIn automatically syncs with Apple Health, making it easy to monitor your wellness journey.

Explore a Range of Techniques

- Square Breathing (4-4-4-4): Regain control and calm your mind.
- Relax Breathing (4-7-8): Beat anxiety and fall asleep faster.
- Bee Breathing: Soothe your mind with this relaxing technique.
- Coherent Breathing: Improve your well-being through HRV enhancement.
- Transform Your Life, One Breath at a Time

Conquer stress, boost your resilience, and rediscover balance with every breath. Download BreatheIn now and take the first step toward a more vibrant, peaceful you!

除了遊戲原作畫面全部的「REGULAR(通常)模式」顯示之外另外追加,

“故事模式”有简单、普通、困难这3种难度。
在“简单”难度中，关卡内的“落脚处”四处可见，能够防止玩家掉落。

※關於(*1)的內容是不支援GameCenter功能。

不知道在哪里能获得隐藏的强化装备、或者想尽快强化的时候，即可通过“个性化设置”简单入手！
提供了“全盔甲”、“全武器”等各式各样的辅助功能，能帮助你更顺利地游戏。

hk.description:
让自己沉浸在《沙丘》的世界中。
在屡获殊荣的棋盘游戏《沙丘：帝国》中，穿梭于地形险恶的厄拉科斯星球，体验策略与阴谋的终极融合！
"在线对战、与人工智能进行本地对战，或与强大的哈葛尔家族对战。
获得成就，展示你作为领袖的实力。
面对十数种挑战，考验你的智慧和狡黠。
在轮换的遭遇战模式中争夺徽章，每场比赛都不尽相同！"
控制香料，就是控制宇宙。
厄拉科斯、沙丘、沙漠星球。在面前的广袤荒原上高举你的旗帜。当立法会各大家族调集军队和间谍时，你将影响谁，又将背叛谁？暴虐的皇帝、神秘的贝尼·杰瑟里特、精明的宇航公会、沙漠深处凶残的弗雷曼人。帝国的力量可以属于你，但战争并不是夺取力量的唯一途径。
《沙丘：帝国》是一款主题鲜明的全新战略游戏，融合了牌组搭建和工人放置的元素，将帝国的命运掌握在你手中。你会寻求政治盟友还是依靠军事力量？靠经济实力还是耍阴谋诡计？让议会席位决定……还是亮出锋利的刀刃？拿好手牌，决定在你手中，帝国正在等待。

hk.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

mo.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

mo.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

mo.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

mo.description:
中隊已經到達你的移動設備！躲避子彈風暴，面對可怕的空中戰爭機器！帶領你的中隊在兩個不同的戰役中取得勝利，充滿故事曲折和傳奇首領大戰！

德國空軍王牌 - 中隊是一款驚心動魄的垂直捲動射擊遊戲，具有引人入勝的全語音敘述。躲避子彈，收集大量增強器，明智地使用特殊技能擊敗敵人。總計50個關卡的兩大戰役，一波又一波的各種致命敵人，眾多史詩首領大戰。你能完成任務嗎？

當歐洲看起來還是自由的時候，一個被稱為“德國空軍王牌”的秘密德國突擊隊借此機會反擊並入侵美國！你的責任就是，在誇張的空戰中，駕駛致命的鋼鐵之翼，重建和平與自由！但是，每個故事都有兩個方面。隨著德國空軍王牌開始對美國進攻，你負責帶領一群精銳德國飛行員執行秘密任務。從百慕大三角的一個秘密基地，開始詭計多端的史詩級空中冒險。選擇你的陣營，決定你的角色，然後起飛！

- 驚心動魄的射擊遊戲，具有爆炸性的特效
- 英勇的非玩家角色僚機將遵從你的命令
- 每架僚機都有包含獨特技能的技能樹
- 富有挑戰性的成就系統
- 引人入勝的故事情節和全語音角色
- 50個關卡和刺激的任務 
- 12個壯觀的首領大戰
- 史詩般的電影式管弦樂配樂

mo.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

mo.description:
請訂閱PlanItPhoto微信公衆號，檢視更多的精彩文章和教程。我們的另外有個免費應用巧攝現場版也已經發布。

44集免費中文視頻教學：
YouTube:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
嗶哩嗶哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499

另外我們還有20個小時的收費直播課。歡迎訂閱我們的微信公衆號瞭解更多資訊。

也許您正在尋找一個這樣的應用，可以說明您計劃風光攝影的各種細節。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧攝專業版就是夢寐以求的應用。不管您喜歡風光攝影的哪個方面，旅遊，城市，自然，夜景，星空，銀河，星軌，縮時，這個應用都可以說明到您。

著名美國攝影師安塞爾•亞當斯在他的第一本書《Taos Pueblo》強調了“可視化”的概念。他提出“預可視化”，也就是說攝影師應該在按下快門之前就想像出最後出來的照片會使怎樣。當然，很多偉大的照片是即興拍攝出來的，但是對於風光攝影師來說，如果可以提前預見到場景的樣子會很大程度上避免因爲沒有準備好而錯失良機，也會大大增加出好片的機會。

現在科技發達，攝影師可以使用很多不同的工具實現場景的預可視化。當然，手機應用就是很多這樣的工具之一，而且越來越流行。我們這個巧攝專業版就是這樣的一個全功能的應用。它巧妙地利用地圖結合各種攝影工具和日月銀河星曆功能，來實現場景預可視化。

在這個看似簡單的應用裏面，我們加了很多的功能。比如說任何地點的GPS座標、海拔高度、兩點距離、海拔高度差、以及從某一點是否可以看到某個景點。這些資訊不單對攝影師，可能對很多熱愛旅遊的人來說，都是重要的。而對攝影師，我們還專門提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不僅如此，我們還加入了星曆錶的功能。這樣您就可以查到任何一天任何地點的日出日落時間、月出月落時間、曙暮光開始結束時間、黃金時段、藍色時段。甚至任何時刻的太陽和月亮的位置你都可以查到。還有星星、星座、銀河、星雲的位置。另外還有星軌計算器和縮時攝影計算器功能，曝光自動計算，ND濾鏡計算器，光度計，彩虹位置預測，部分國家的潮汐資料。可以說是風光攝影需要的功能，應有盡有。和其它類似應用不同的是我們這個應用把上面提到的所有功能都在地圖上或者取景框方式下直觀地顯示出來，各個功能之間還可以結合使用。

風光攝影是我們對自然界的探險。 我們知道您在外面探索時，可能會沒有任何網路。 巧攝專業版當然知道這個，所以只要您預裝離線海拔檔案和離線mbtiles地圖，您可以完全離線使用該應用程式，而無需網路連接。

mo.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

mo.description:
Feeling overwhelmed by the chaos of life? Find your peace and vitality with BreatheIn, the app that helps you unlock the power of mindful breathing.

Rediscover Calm and Energy

Deep, mindful breathing is the key to a calm mind and a vibrant body. With BreatheIn, immerse yourself in guided exercises that harmonize your body and mind, leading to true balance and renewal.

Expertly Curated Practices

We've handpicked and tested each exercise to ensure you get the best. Start your journey toward a healthier, more fulfilled life today!

Seamless Apple Health Integration

Track your progress effortlessly—BreatheIn automatically syncs with Apple Health, making it easy to monitor your wellness journey.

Explore a Range of Techniques

- Square Breathing (4-4-4-4): Regain control and calm your mind.
- Relax Breathing (4-7-8): Beat anxiety and fall asleep faster.
- Bee Breathing: Soothe your mind with this relaxing technique.
- Coherent Breathing: Improve your well-being through HRV enhancement.
- Transform Your Life, One Breath at a Time

Conquer stress, boost your resilience, and rediscover balance with every breath. Download BreatheIn now and take the first step toward a more vibrant, peaceful you!

無論您喜歡深色或淺色模式，這款啟動器都能很好地配合，讓您選擇最適合自己的檢視方式。

使用 Dumb Phone，保持專注，簡化您的數位生活。

以《洛克人 X》系列為主軸，展現新世界觀「if」的《ROCKMAN X DiVE》將以離線版重新登場！
盡情體驗系列為人所知的橫向捲軸遊戲吧！

《洛克人 X》系列的遊戲資料保存於名為「深層紀錄檔」的電腦世界。
某天在深層記錄檔的世界中突然發生了原因不明的錯誤，導致「洛克人X」的遊戲資料發生異常。
操作「艾克斯」與「傑洛」等傳說中的英雄，挑戰非正規資料，修復遊戲資料吧！

■如實呈現洛克人各種動作
衝刺、跳躍、手砲、光劍——《洛克人X》的升種正宗動作將完全於遊戲重現！
另外更有本作特有的360度射擊和自動瞄準！

■超過100名《洛克人》歷代角色登場
收集自己喜愛的《洛克人》角色，再加以育成吧！
不論是記憶中的歷代角色，還是原創角色，都將以全新面貌登場！

遊玩《ROCKMAN X DiVE》的原創故事，和新的洛克人相遇吧。
關卡各個難度合計共數百個，內容豐富，在其中盡情體驗洛克人的動作吧！

卡片設計以原作插圖為基礎，不論強化或收集都樂趣無窮！

mo.description:
移植動作遊戲經典名作「洛克人X」,按照原作添加新要素
充分利用各式各樣的武器和強化裝備,粉碎一擊「西格瑪」的野心

◆威力加強部份
1.【對應Retina顯示!!】
「洛克人X」讓人懷念的畫面將忠實原味地呈現。

2.【2種畫面模式!!】
除了遊戲原作畫面全部的「REGULAR(通常)模式」顯示之外另外追加,
在iPhone螢幕上(裡)提供以全面顯示的「FULL(全屏幕)模式」搭載。

3.【三种游戏难度！ 】
“故事模式”有简单、普通、困难这3种难度。
在“简单”难度中，关卡内的“落脚处”四处可见，能够防止玩家掉落。
如果你对操作有自信，推荐选择需要技巧的“困难”！

4.【 排行榜模式！（Game Center支持功能） 】
提供了可以与其他玩家争夺排行榜排名的“ 排行榜模式”。
具备按分数排名的“高分模式”、按最快通关排名的“竞时模式”、按通关数量排名的“无限模式”。
多多练习，提高操作技术，争夺更高的排名吧！

5.【80個挑戰!!(支援GameCenter功能)】
「STORY MODE」挑戰序幕關卡,挑戰20個(*1),在完成序幕關卡之後,提供60種的合計80種挑戰項目!
※關於(*1)的內容是不支援GameCenter功能。

6.【帮助你游戏的辅助功能！】
不知道在哪里能获得隐藏的强化装备、或者想尽快强化的时候，即可通过“个性化设置”简单入手！
提供了“全盔甲”、“全武器”等各式各样的辅助功能，能帮助你更顺利地游戏。
使用实惠的“完美套装”，拥有最强装备！还具备“编曲BGM”，能变更游戏原本的BGM！

※辅助功能和“编曲BGM”需要付费购买。

------------

◆操作方法

移動•••••方向鍵按鈕
發射•••攻擊按鈕
跳躍•••跳躍按鈕
武器更換•••右上的武器變更按鈕

快速更換武器•••嘗試著觸摸遊戲畫面的頂部!然而在按著不放的狀態下將手指向左右拖曳(挪動),就能簡單地更換武器裝備!
解除裝甲騎乘…按右上方表示的圖標

------------

mo.description:
A new warrior has entered the ring!

Take control of 32 world warriors and test your mettle against players from around the world. Street Fighter IV: Champion Edition perfects the winning gameplay formula by offering higher resolution graphics, three new characters (Rose, Juri and Elena) wide screen support for newer iOS devices and a host of updates and refinements. Long time Street Fighter fans can jump into the action and have an instant familiarity with the controls. For more casual players Street Fighter IV features numerous settings and tutorials that put you on the path to victory.
• Fight as 32 Street Fighter characters 
• Higher resolution graphics and wide screen support
• Intuitive virtual pad controls allow players to execute full move sets including Unique Attacks, Special Moves, Focus Attacks, Super Combos and Ultra Combos 
• Take your game to the next level with a MFi controller like the Gamevice (MFi controllers do not work in menus, they fully function in multiplayer and single-player gameplay.)
• Battle head-to-head against players from around the world via Wifi
• Single player “arcade” and multiplayer modes.
• Unleash super moves with a tap of the “SP” button.
• Four levels of difficulty.


Please check [Supported OS and Devices] in the lower part of HP.
https://www.capcom-games.com/product/en-us/streetfighter4-championedition/?t=openv

mo.description:
让自己沉浸在《沙丘》的世界中。
在屡获殊荣的棋盘游戏《沙丘：帝国》中，穿梭于地形险恶的厄拉科斯星球，体验策略与阴谋的终极融合！
"在线对战、与人工智能进行本地对战，或与强大的哈葛尔家族对战。
获得成就，展示你作为领袖的实力。
面对十数种挑战，考验你的智慧和狡黠。
在轮换的遭遇战模式中争夺徽章，每场比赛都不尽相同！"
控制香料，就是控制宇宙。
厄拉科斯、沙丘、沙漠星球。在面前的广袤荒原上高举你的旗帜。当立法会各大家族调集军队和间谍时，你将影响谁，又将背叛谁？暴虐的皇帝、神秘的贝尼·杰瑟里特、精明的宇航公会、沙漠深处凶残的弗雷曼人。帝国的力量可以属于你，但战争并不是夺取力量的唯一途径。
《沙丘：帝国》是一款主题鲜明的全新战略游戏，融合了牌组搭建和工人放置的元素，将帝国的命运掌握在你手中。你会寻求政治盟友还是依靠军事力量？靠经济实力还是耍阴谋诡计？让议会席位决定……还是亮出锋利的刀刃？拿好手牌，决定在你手中，帝国正在等待。

mo.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

- NEW: HOME EXPERIENCE

Uncover the presence of Ozhin within your home. Prepare yourself for an eerie encounter as supernatural occurrences come to life.

This experience utilises HomeKit to interact with your home devices. This feature is only available to users with HomeKit accessories. Please note that this experience includes rapid and random flashing of lights, which may not be suitable for individuals with epilepsy or those prone to seizures. If you have epilepsy or are sensitive to intense light patterns, please exercise caution or refrain from using this feature to avoid any potential risks.

By receiving, opening the file package, and/or using Countdown('Software') containing this software, you agree that this End User License Agreement(EULA) is a legally binding and valid contract and agree to be bound by it. You agree to abide by the intellectual property laws and all of the terms and conditions of this Agreement. User shall accept the terms of his or her fate. Any attempt to use information derived from Countdown to alter the user’s fate will result in a breach of this agreement.

tw.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

德國空軍王牌 - 中隊是一款驚心動魄的垂直捲動射擊遊戲，具有引人入勝的全語音敘述。躲避子彈，收集大量增強器，明智地使用特殊技能擊敗敵人。總計50個關卡的兩大戰役，一波又一波的各種致命敵人，眾多史詩首領大戰。你能完成任務嗎？

當歐洲看起來還是自由的時候，一個被稱為“德國空軍王牌”的秘密德國突擊隊借此機會反擊並入侵美國！你的責任就是，在誇張的空戰中，駕駛致命的鋼鐵之翼，重建和平與自由！但是，每個故事都有兩個方面。隨著德國空軍王牌開始對美國進攻，你負責帶領一群精銳德國飛行員執行秘密任務。從百慕大三角的一個秘密基地，開始詭計多端的史詩級空中冒險。選擇你的陣營，決定你的角色，然後起飛！

tw.description:
我們將卡牌遊戲與 Roguelike 遊戲融為一體，製作出了這款最棒的單機牌組構築遊戲。打造出獨一無二的牌組、遇見無數離奇的生物、發現威力強大的遺物、去屠戮這座高塔吧！

遊戲特色
- 動態構建的牌組：謹慎選擇你的卡牌！在攀爬高塔的途中邂逅百餘張不同的卡牌，選擇是否將它們加入你的牌組，透過組合和搭配來讓牌組發揮力量，打敗敵人、挑戰登頂。
- 不斷變化的高塔：每次開始爬塔的旅程時，高塔的構造都會發生變化。是選擇高風險高回報，還是謹慎前行？面對不同的敵人、選擇不同的卡牌、發現不同的遺物、甚至挑戰不同的首領！
- 威力強大的遺物：在塔中你將發現名為遺物的各種強大物品，這些遺物可能會與你的牌組產生強大的化學反應，讓你的戰力得到飛躍。但也不要過於大意，為了獲得遺物，有時你所付出的代價，可會超過區區金錢……

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

tw.releaseNotes:

tw.description:
請訂閱PlanItPhoto微信公衆號，檢視更多的精彩文章和教程。我們的另外有個免費應用巧攝現場版也已經發布。

44集免費中文視頻教學：
YouTube:
https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbfOTOEQhi3klBpHP952Y9je
嗶哩嗶哩：
https://space.bilibili.com/382927099/channel/seriesdetail?sid=2490499

另外我們還有20個小時的收費直播課。歡迎訂閱我們的微信公衆號瞭解更多資訊。

也許您正在尋找一個這樣的應用，可以說明您計劃風光攝影的各種細節。那恭喜您，真的不用再找了，巧攝專業版就是夢寐以求的應用。不管您喜歡風光攝影的哪個方面，旅遊，城市，自然，夜景，星空，銀河，星軌，縮時，這個應用都可以說明到您。

著名美國攝影師安塞爾•亞當斯在他的第一本書《Taos Pueblo》強調了“可視化”的概念。他提出“預可視化”，也就是說攝影師應該在按下快門之前就想像出最後出來的照片會使怎樣。當然，很多偉大的照片是即興拍攝出來的，但是對於風光攝影師來說，如果可以提前預見到場景的樣子會很大程度上避免因爲沒有準備好而錯失良機，也會大大增加出好片的機會。

現在科技發達，攝影師可以使用很多不同的工具實現場景的預可視化。當然，手機應用就是很多這樣的工具之一，而且越來越流行。我們這個巧攝專業版就是這樣的一個全功能的應用。它巧妙地利用地圖結合各種攝影工具和日月銀河星曆功能，來實現場景預可視化。

在這個看似簡單的應用裏面，我們加了很多的功能。比如說任何地點的GPS座標、海拔高度、兩點距離、海拔高度差、以及從某一點是否可以看到某個景點。這些資訊不單對攝影師，可能對很多熱愛旅遊的人來說，都是重要的。而對攝影師，我們還專門提供了焦距（水平方向和垂直方向），景深、超焦距和全景工具。不僅如此，我們還加入了星曆錶的功能。這樣您就可以查到任何一天任何地點的日出日落時間、月出月落時間、曙暮光開始結束時間、黃金時段、藍色時段。甚至任何時刻的太陽和月亮的位置你都可以查到。還有星星、星座、銀河、星雲的位置。另外還有星軌計算器和縮時攝影計算器功能，曝光自動計算，ND濾鏡計算器，光度計，彩虹位置預測，部分國家的潮汐資料。可以說是風光攝影需要的功能，應有盡有。和其它類似應用不同的是我們這個應用把上面提到的所有功能都在地圖上或者取景框方式下直觀地顯示出來，各個功能之間還可以結合使用。

風光攝影是我們對自然界的探險。 我們知道您在外面探索時，可能會沒有任何網路。 巧攝專業版當然知道這個，所以只要您預裝離線海拔檔案和離線mbtiles地圖，您可以完全離線使用該應用程式，而無需網路連接。

隱私聲明：https://planitphoto.cn/privacy.html

tw.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

以《洛克人 X》系列為主軸，展現新世界觀「if」的《ROCKMAN X DiVE》將以離線版重新登場！
盡情體驗系列為人所知的橫向捲軸遊戲吧！

《洛克人 X》系列的遊戲資料保存於名為「深層紀錄檔」的電腦世界。
某天在深層記錄檔的世界中突然發生了原因不明的錯誤，導致「洛克人X」的遊戲資料發生異常。
操作「艾克斯」與「傑洛」等傳說中的英雄，挑戰非正規資料，修復遊戲資料吧！

■如實呈現洛克人各種動作
衝刺、跳躍、手砲、光劍——《洛克人X》的升種正宗動作將完全於遊戲重現！
另外更有本作特有的360度射擊和自動瞄準！
按鈕的大小與位置亦可按需要自行調整！

■超過100名《洛克人》歷代角色登場
收集自己喜愛的《洛克人》角色，再加以育成吧！
不論是記憶中的歷代角色，還是原創角色，都將以全新面貌登場！

■豐富遊戲內容！多達數百個關卡和原創故事
遊玩《ROCKMAN X DiVE》的原創故事，和新的洛克人相遇吧。
關卡各個難度合計共數百個，內容豐富，在其中盡情體驗洛克人的動作吧！

■以武器、晶片和卡片強化角色
武器可以任意和所有角色搭配，再加以強化！
升星後會解放技能，可強化內容也會變多！
卡片設計以原作插圖為基礎，不論強化或收集都樂趣無窮！

充分利用各式各樣的武器和強化裝備,粉碎一擊「西格瑪」的野心

◆威力加強部份
1.【對應Retina顯示!!】
「洛克人X」讓人懷念的畫面將忠實原味地呈現。

2.【2種畫面模式!!】
除了遊戲原作畫面全部的「REGULAR(通常)模式」顯示之外另外追加,
在iPhone螢幕上(裡)提供以全面顯示的「FULL(全屏幕)模式」搭載。

3.【三种游戏难度！ 】
“故事模式”有简单、普通、困难这3种难度。
在“简单”难度中，关卡内的“落脚处”四处可见，能够防止玩家掉落。
如果你对操作有自信，推荐选择需要技巧的“困难”！

4.【 排行榜模式！（Game Center支持功能） 】
提供了可以与其他玩家争夺排行榜排名的“ 排行榜模式”。
具备按分数排名的“高分模式”、按最快通关排名的“竞时模式”、按通关数量排名的“无限模式”。
多多练习，提高操作技术，争夺更高的排名吧！

5.【80個挑戰!!(支援GameCenter功能)】
「STORY MODE」挑戰序幕關卡,挑戰20個(*1),在完成序幕關卡之後,提供60種的合計80種挑戰項目!
※關於(*1)的內容是不支援GameCenter功能。

6.【帮助你游戏的辅助功能！】
不知道在哪里能获得隐藏的强化装备、或者想尽快强化的时候，即可通过“个性化设置”简单入手！
提供了“全盔甲”、“全武器”等各式各样的辅助功能，能帮助你更顺利地游戏。
使用实惠的“完美套装”，拥有最强装备！还具备“编曲BGM”，能变更游戏原本的BGM！

※辅助功能和“编曲BGM”需要付费购买。

tw.description:
让自己沉浸在《沙丘》的世界中。
在屡获殊荣的棋盘游戏《沙丘：帝国》中，穿梭于地形险恶的厄拉科斯星球，体验策略与阴谋的终极融合！
"在线对战、与人工智能进行本地对战，或与强大的哈葛尔家族对战。
获得成就，展示你作为领袖的实力。
面对十数种挑战，考验你的智慧和狡黠。
在轮换的遭遇战模式中争夺徽章，每场比赛都不尽相同！"
控制香料，就是控制宇宙。
厄拉科斯、沙丘、沙漠星球。在面前的广袤荒原上高举你的旗帜。当立法会各大家族调集军队和间谍时，你将影响谁，又将背叛谁？暴虐的皇帝、神秘的贝尼·杰瑟里特、精明的宇航公会、沙漠深处凶残的弗雷曼人。帝国的力量可以属于你，但战争并不是夺取力量的唯一途径。
《沙丘：帝国》是一款主题鲜明的全新战略游戏，融合了牌组搭建和工人放置的元素，将帝国的命运掌握在你手中。你会寻求政治盟友还是依靠军事力量？靠经济实力还是耍阴谋诡计？让议会席位决定……还是亮出锋利的刀刃？拿好手牌，决定在你手中，帝国正在等待。

tw.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP!

Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs!

Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge?

• Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential.

●  Form a Battle Strategy

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

us.description:
The Squadron has reached your mobile device! Dodge a bullet storm and face fearsome aerial war machines! Lead your squadron to victory in two different campaigns, full of story twists and legendary boss fights!

ACES OF THE LUFTWAFFE - SQUADRON is an action-packed vertical scrolling shoot‘ em-up with a fascinating and fully voiced narrative. Dodge bullets, collect massive power-ups and wisely use special abilities to defeat your enemies. Two campaigns with 50 levels in total, waves of various deadly enemies and a lot of epic boss fights. Are you up to this task?

When Europe seemed to be free, a secret German commando called The Aces of the Luftwaffe took their chance to strike back and invade the USA! It’s your duty to restore peace and liberty aboard deadly wings of steel in bombastic air battles! However, every story has two sides. While the Aces of Luftwaffe begin their assault on the United States, you are charged with leading a squad of elite German pilots on a secret mission. Embarc on an epic aerial adventure of intrigue and deceit from a secret base in the Bermuda Triangle. Choose your side, decide your role and take off!

- Action-packed Shoot ’em up with explosive special effects
- Heroic NPC wingmen that will follow your order
- Skill trees with individual abilities for each wingman
- Challenging achievement system
- Captivating storyline with fully voiced characters
- 50 levels and exciting missions 
- 12 spectacular boss fights
- Epic movie-like orchestral soundtrack

The battle continues after “1941 Frozen Front” – and this time, it’s all about naval warfare! Join the navy and fight to win the battle of your life! Own the battlefield and send your soldiers to the frontline. Military combat at its best!
Choose the right tactics and use your commando to defeat the enemy! Lead the U.S. Army on their campaign or command the Japanese forces on their mission! FIGHT with powerful weapons like torpedos and bombs!
TAKE OUT enemy positions with tanks and infantry!
BOMBARD hostile headquarters with mighty bomber wings!
SURPRISE the enemy with attacks from your submarine!
EMPLACE your artillery in rough terrain!
CLEAR beaches, lagoons and straits!

We fused card games and roguelikes together to make the best single player deckbuilder we could. Craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, discover relics of immense power, and Slay the Spire!

us.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

us.description:
Please email info@planitphoto.com for bug reports or feature requests. Please also remember to visit https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbcn1Fd1NRWTOczTY1RYEug4 for more video tutorials. Each video only lasts a few minutes but you will surely learn a lot from them. You can also reach us through Instagram. Links are under the menu inside the app.

This is a special call to landscape photographers, travel photographers, nature photographers, and those who are interested in night photography, city photography, time-lapse, star-trails, milky way or astrophotography: look no more, this is the ultimate app for you - the Planit Pro. It only costs you a cup of Frappuccino but will save you tons of time and effort and a lot of gas money. Most importantly, it will make you enjoy landscape photography even more.

Ansel Adams dedicates the beginning of his first book "Taos Pueblo" to visualization. He introduced the idea of "previsualization", which involved the photographer imagining what he wanted his final print to look like before he even took the photo. Of course, there are many great photos that were taken impromptu. However, for landscape photographers, being able to previsualize the scene before going there will greatly reduce the chance of being caught unprepared and will greatly increase the chance of getting better photos.

Photographers use various tools to help them pre-visualizing the scene. Nowadays, many of those tools are phone apps. Planit Pro is an all-in-one solution that is designed to leverage the map and simulated viewfinder technologies to provide the necessary tools for photographers to pre-visualize the scene in combination with the ground subjects and the celestial objects such as the Sun, the Moon, Stars, Star-trails and Milky Way.

In the Planit Pro app, we packed it with features - from location scouting such as GPS coordinates, elevations, distance, elevation gain, clear view, focal length, depth of field (DoF), hyperfocal distance, panorama, and aerial photography, to the Ephemeris features such as the sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset time and direction, twilight time, special hours of the day, sun/moon finder, major stars, constellations, nebulae azimuth and elevation angle, star trail planning, time-lapse calculation and simulation, sequence calculation and simulation, milky way searching, solar eclipse and lunar eclipse, exposure/ND filter calculator, light meter, rainbow position prediction, tide height, and tide search, etc. All the information is either represented on the map as an overlay or visually presented in simulated viewfinders (VR, AR, picture, or street view), just like you look through your camera's viewfinder. Whatever you want for your landscape photography, it is there in the Planit Pro.

Landscape photography is an adventure in the natural world. We understand that sometimes there won't be any network connection when you are out exploring. Planit Pro was designed for having it in mind. If you preload the offline elevation files and the offline mbtiles maps, you can use the app fully offline without the need for network connections.

License agreement at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy at https://planitphoto.com/privacy.html

us.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

Immerse yourself in the world of Dune. 

Experience the ultimate blend of strategy and intrigue as you navigate the treacherous landscapes of Arrakis in the award-winning board game Dune: Imperium!

Battle online, locally with AI, or against the formidable House Hagal.

Earn Achievements that showcase your prowess as a leader.

Embark on more than a dozen Challenges that will test your wit and cunning.

Compete for badges in the rotating Skirmish Mode where no two games are the same!

Control the Spice. Control the Universe.

Arrakis. Dune. Desert Planet. Raise your banner above the vast wasteland before you. As the Great Houses of the Landsraad marshal their forces and their spies, whom will you influence, and whom will you betray? A tyrannical Emperor. The secretive Bene Gesserit. The shrewd Spacing Guild. The ferocious Fremen of the Deep Desert. The power of the Imperium can be yours, but war is not the only way to claim it.

Dune: Imperium blends deck-building and worker placement in a deeply thematic new strategy game where the fate of the Empire hangs on your decisions. Will you seek political allies or rely upon military might? Economic strength or subtle intrigues? A council seat… or a sharpened blade? The cards are dealt. The choice is yours. The Imperium awaits.

us.description:
Play the digital adaptation of the beloved tabletop board game. Root is a game of adventure and war where 2 to 4 players battle for control of a vast wilderness.

The nefarious Marquise de Cat has seized the great woodland, intent on harvesting its riches. Under her rule, the many creatures of the forest have banded together. This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

tr.description:
Please email info@planitphoto.com for bug reports or feature requests. Please also remember to visit https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTmlTTxPbBbcn1Fd1NRWTOczTY1RYEug4 for more video tutorials. Each video only lasts a few minutes but you will surely learn a lot from them. You can also reach us through Instagram. Links are under the menu inside the app.

This is a special call to landscape photographers, travel photographers, nature photographers, and those who are interested in night photography, city photography, time-lapse, star-trails, milky way or astrophotography: look no more, this is the ultimate app for you - the Planit Pro. It only costs you a cup of Frappuccino but will save you tons of time and effort and a lot of gas money. Most importantly, it will make you enjoy landscape photography even more.

Ansel Adams dedicates the beginning of his first book "Taos Pueblo" to visualization. He introduced the idea of "previsualization", which involved the photographer imagining what he wanted his final print to look like before he even took the photo. Of course, there are many great photos that were taken impromptu. However, for landscape photographers, being able to previsualize the scene before going there will greatly reduce the chance of being caught unprepared and will greatly increase the chance of getting better photos.

Photographers use various tools to help them pre-visualizing the scene. Nowadays, many of those tools are phone apps. Planit Pro is an all-in-one solution that is designed to leverage the map and simulated viewfinder technologies to provide the necessary tools for photographers to pre-visualize the scene in combination with the ground subjects and the celestial objects such as the Sun, the Moon, Stars, Star-trails and Milky Way.

In the Planit Pro app, we packed it with features - from location scouting such as GPS coordinates, elevations, distance, elevation gain, clear view, focal length, depth of field (DoF), hyperfocal distance, panorama, and aerial photography, to the Ephemeris features such as the sunrise, sunset, moonrise, moonset time and direction, twilight time, special hours of the day, sun/moon finder, major stars, constellations, nebulae azimuth and elevation angle, star trail planning, time-lapse calculation and simulation, sequence calculation and simulation, milky way searching, solar eclipse and lunar eclipse, exposure/ND filter calculator, light meter, rainbow position prediction, tide height, and tide search, etc. All the information is either represented on the map as an overlay or visually presented in simulated viewfinders (VR, AR, picture, or street view), just like you look through your camera's viewfinder. Whatever you want for your landscape photography, it is there in the Planit Pro.

Landscape photography is an adventure in the natural world. We understand that sometimes there won't be any network connection when you are out exploring. Planit Pro was designed for having it in mind. If you preload the offline elevation files and the offline mbtiles maps, you can use the app fully offline without the need for network connections.

License agreement at https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy Policy at https://planitphoto.com/privacy.html

SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

This Alliance will seek to strengthen its resources and subvert the rule of Cats. In this effort, the Alliance may enlist the help of the wandering Vagabonds who are able to move through the more dangerous woodland paths. Though some may sympathize with the Alliance’s hopes and dreams, these wanderers are old enough to remember the great birds of prey who once controlled the woods.

Meanwhile, at the edge of the region, the proud, squabbling Eyrie have found a new commander who they hope will lead their faction to resume their ancient birthright.

The stage is set for a contest that will decide the fate of the great woodland. It is up to the players to decide which group will ultimately take root.
